1.0.name: wordpress/recipress-pantrywidget
1.0.description:
This is an add-on for the ReciPress WordPress plugin and will not provide any functionality to WordPress unless ReciPress is installed and activated.

The Pantry Widget allows you to mark ingredients that you currently have in your pantry as well as list them as links to recipes you have that include that ingredient.

Source Repository on GitHub

https://github.com/Omicron7/recipress-pantrywidget

Bugs, Questions or Suggestions

https://github.com/Omicron7/recipress-pantrywidget/issues This is a side project and may not recieve regular updates or improvements.
